overview: The return of four-division world champion and one of boxing’s must-see attractions Adrien “The Problem” Broner headlines an exciting three-fight card when he takes on undefeated Puerto Rican Jovanie Santiago. Heavyweight contenders Dominic Breazeale and Otto Wallin clash in a 50-50 fight in the co-featured bout and former world champion Robert Easter Jr. takes on Ryan Martin in the telecast opener. Live on SHOWTIME.
title: Adrien Broner vs. Jovanie Santiago
